short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get key insights from articles, PDF-s, podcasts and YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blinkist AI is a new product (currently in Beta) by Blinkist. In short, it's a website where people can obtain key insights from various sources: web articles, PDFs, podcasts, and YouTube videos.

The Chrome Extension complements the web application nicelyâ€”instead of copy-pasting links, one can simply click on the Chrome Extension icon to summarize a page.

IMPORTANT: The Blinkist AI product is currently in closed beta. We are slowly rolling it out to new users. If you don't have a beta invitation, add your email to the waiting list and stay tuned.
